DOC.brief_title: Eletriptan Provides Consistent Migraine Relief : Results Of A Within-Patient Multiple-Dose Study
DOC.criteria: Male Female subject good general health , age 18 65 year . Subjects meet IHS diagnostic criterion migraine without aura . Based past history , subject expect suffer least one acute attack migraine without aura , 6 week Known coronaryartery disease , clinically significant arrhythmia , heart failure , uncontrolled hypertension . Pregnant lactating woman . Clinically significant electrocardiogram abnormality screen .
